backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 605-2021 - 2685 Kingston Road

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 605-2021 to designate the property at 2685 Kingston Road (Ward 20 Scarborough Southwest) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: 2021.PB22.4 - Inclusion on the City of Toronto's Heritage Register, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act, Alterations to a Heritage Property, and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 2685 Kingston Road

By-law 605-2021 - To designate the property at 2685 Kingston Road as being of cultural heritage value or interest
